caption: The video features a masked robber. Threaten two women at gunpoint in a home, sit on the couch, and do not move. The robbers then forced one of the women at gunpoint to join them in stuffing a body in a garbage bag in the trunk of a car. The robbers then tied the women to the guardrail on the balcony of the house. The robbers then drove away from the property. In the next scene, the robbers drive to a wasteland and dump the body in the basement of the wasteland. The robber then returned to the house but did not wear a balaclava. When the robbers found out about this, they became very angry and cut a woman. The robber threatened the woman and told her to call his father. The next scene is in the basement of the wasteland, the policeman in the garbage bag is not killed, he wakes up and tries to escape the basement.
